column.name: S_DESCRIPTION
column.value: Edición 2019

column.name: SUCCESSFULLY_RESPONSE_MSG
column.value: Correo recibido correctamente / Email received correctly

column.name: ERROR_RESPONSE_MSG
column.value: Email recibido con errores / Email received with errors

column.name: S_DESCRIPTION
column.value: International RTTY Contest FMRE

column.name: S_DESCRIPTION
column.value: When email has recived is setted with this status

column.name: S_DESCRIPTION
column.value: The subject contains the word 'Undelivered' because that this email will be ignored

column.name: S_DESCRIPTION
column.value: The email contains a file identified as a logfile

column.name: S_DESCRIPTION
column.value: The logfile cannot be identified as a logfile

column.name: S_DESCRIPTION
column.value: The logfile was succesfully parsed into log and qsos registers

column.name: S_DESCRIPTION
column.value: The logfile cannot exists or cannot be parsed into log and qsos registers

column.name: S_DESCRIPTION
column.value: Email verified to check errors

column.name: S_DESCRIPTION
column.value: Email answered (with successfully or error message)

column.name: S_SUGGESTION_EN
column.value: Your email don't contains subject, please remember include the subject of your email (that should be only your callsign) and resend.

column.name: S_SUGGESTION_ES
column.value: Su correo electrónico no contiene asunto, recuerde incluir el asunto de su correo electrónico (que debería ser solo su indicativo) y reenvie.

column.name: S_SUGGESTION_EN
column.value: Your email don't contains any attached file, please remember attach your logfile and resend i.t

column.name: S_SUGGESTION_ES
column.value: Su correo electrónico no contiene ningún archivo adjunto, recuerde adjuntar su archivo de registro y reenvie.

column.name: S_SUGGESTION_EN
column.value: Your email contains some attached files but we cant to determine wich one is your logfile, remember that your log file should be named with a .txt, .log or .cbr extension, please rename and attach your logfile an resend it again.

column.name: S_SUGGESTION_ES
column.value: Su correo electrónico contiene algunos archivos adjuntos pero no podemos determinar cuál es su archivo de log, recuerde que su archivo de log debe nombrarse con una extensión .txt, .log o .cbr, cambie el nombre y adjunte su archivo de registro y vuelva a envielo.

column.name: S_SUGGESTION_EN
column.value: Your email contains some attached files but we cant to determine wich one is your logfile because many of that can be, remember that your log file should be named with a .txt, .log or .cbr extension, please rename and attach your logfile an resend again.

column.name: S_SUGGESTION_ES
column.value: Su correo electrónico contiene algunos archivos adjuntos, pero no podemos determinar cuál es su archivo de log porque mas de uno de ellos podría ser, recuerde que su archivo de log debe nombrarse con una extensión .txt, .log o .cbr, por favor verifique esto y reenvie.

column.name: S_SUGGESTION_EN
column.value: The subject on your email is not equals than the callsign on your log (that was taked from your logfile), remember that your subject should be equals than your callsign on your log. Please, correct it and resend it.

column.name: S_SUGGESTION_ES
column.value: El asunto en su correo electrónico no es igual al indicativo en su registro (que fue tomado de su archivo de registro), recuerde que su asunto debe ser igual a su indicativo en su log Por favor, corríjalo y reenvíelo.

column.name: S_SUGGESTION_EN
column.value: We were able to find your file but we can't to parse it into a log. Please check that your logfile was generated on cabrillo format and resend it.

column.name: S_SUGGESTION_ES
column.value: Pudimos encontrar un posible archivo de log pero no pudimos analizarlo. Compruebe que su archivo de log se generó en formato cabrillo y vuelva a enviarlo.

column.name: S_SUGGESTION_EN
column.value: Your email subject contains more than one word please remember include the subject of your email (that should be only your callsign) and resend it.

column.name: S_SUGGESTION_ES
column.value: Su asunto de su correo contiene más de una palabra, recuerde incluir el asunto de su correo electrónico (que debería ser solo su indicativo) y vuelva a enviarlo.
